properties.name: Pozitive Pathways
properties.imageAlt: A clipping of a AIDS Committee of Windsor Monthly Newsletter which showcases a picture of a CHOK 1070 radio panel and a caption that reads “AIDS Awareness was October 11-17, and the AIDS Committee of Windsor held a number of forums in an effort to “Get the Facts” out to the public. The above photo was taken at a public forum on AIDS at SCITS Secondary School in Sarnia. The event was broadcast live on CHOK-AM 1070 Radio. The panelists were, from left, Brother Anthony, the Medical Officer of Health for Lambton County Dr. Lucy Duncan, the moderator from CHOK Peter Henderson, Dr. Brad Munt, and ACW Public Education Director Kevin Bishop. See page three for a complete list of AIDS Awareness Week events”
